auguste.server.command.client

Class ClientCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • auguste.server.command.client.ClientCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountCreate, ChatSend, ChatUserList, GameConfig, GameCreate, GameJoin, GameLeave, GameList, GameStart, LogIn, LogOut

    public abstract class ClientCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe abstraite des commandes user à exécuter.
